author: Chris Peercy
comment: Looks really great on my Huawei 2. Highly customizable watchface, lots of information you can have displayed. If you have trouble getting it on your watch, it does take a bit, so be patient (I know 2017 and all, go outside maybe?). Well worth my 2 bucks.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Chris, thanks!

author: David Amundson
comment: Had some difficulty getting this face onto my watch but well worth the trouble.  Really enjoy all the personalization options and it doesn't seem to hemorrhage battery power like some of the other faces I tried.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up David im glad you like it!

author: Nicholas Hertzler
comment: Look, it's a gorgeous watch face, but I refunded because I only see the ambient display for about 3 seconds when I look at the watch. I have to stare at the face for  a while before the full watch face actually displays. If there's a setting I missed, or this is fixed, I will re-buy.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: word up Nicholas, you must be referring to the ambient settings.

author: Scottietwotones
comment: Can see the face on my watch but have no settings available I also don't see any companion app on my phone to sync with, the design is nice but would like the customization for it.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Scottie... Try to look into the Android Wear app... you'll see a thumbnail of the watch... try to click on the Cog, or 3 little dots in the corner... youll have access to the settings.

author: Philip Roberts
comment: When using this face, connection between the phone and watch is not 100% in sync I don't have a problem with My other faces with this! S7edge with Sony sw3

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Philip.. i've never witness this before.. not sure what's up... but that's not a behavior i've ever seen before...

author: Exiel J. Gonzalez
comment: So once I figured out how to get all the features to work, its a nice watch face...

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Exiel... 99% of the time, you have to have your location set to "High accuracy" on the phone for it to pick up your location. (thank you for finding it out)

title: Nice...

author: GildLaw - GildQueen
comment: I cannot find it on my watch can anyone help.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Yudish, Regarding Android wear 2.0 and my watchfaces ...install them on your phone, and then check the "apps on your phone" section of the Play Store on your watch.

author: Stephen Foster
comment: Glitches out and crashed my watch I have a zenwatch 2

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Stephen... i have the same watch right here and it works flawless.

author: Andrew Cassato
comment: Looks great, highly customization, great ambient mode. -2 stars for the heart rate and step counter widgets constantly showing 0

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Andrew, did you start the Fit app? you can email me if you want...

author: Jennifer Kratovil
comment: Very sleek. It would be perfect if the time on the always on screen were bigger (or at least adjustable).

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Jennifer... noted!

author: Chris Clunk
comment: New favorite watchface!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Chris, thanks so much for the props, much appreciated!

author: Beauregard Stauffer
comment: I love it. Just one gripe. The battery indicator is slightly off center to the right, where it should be smack dab in the center. Not sure how to fix it.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Beauregard .... yeah depending on watches that may vary.. i fixed it in a upcoming version i believe.. stay tuned while i cook :)

title: Almost perfect, using Huawei Watch.

author: Ashish Makati
comment: I am rather pleased with this watch-face. It goes well with the black metal band on my Moto 360(2nd gen). However, it would be extremely useful if one could add a secondary time-zone to the face.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Ashish, ill keep it in mind, thanks for the huge support.. i appreciated it.

title: Needs 2nd time-zone

author: Sam Horder
comment: Great that you can change colours etc but the battery level shown on watch (Sony sw3) is miles out to phone (Sony Z5). Also won't change to square shape on watch after changing on phone.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Sam... The change on phone for the square watch in only in the preview.. but i think i know whats going on.. lemme make a update for you shortly...  Thanks for the comment!

title: Almost great

author: Pilottoaster
comment: Keeps glitching out and going full black and unresponsive on the huawei watch.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Pilottoaster. something must have gone wrong in your installation, you may email me if you want ill try to help you out. Thanks for the comment!

title: Glitchy on huawei watch

author: Carlos Cruz
comment: I have this and other face watches for my Moto 360, but now I have a gear s3 and it would great if the author would make it for that watch. I wouldn't mind buying them again for it.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Carlos, im looking for a proper way to convert my work to Tizen which runs on Samsung watches... thanks for the patience.

title: One of the best out there.

author: Piotr Karnas
comment: Can you please stop making these gorgeous watch faces?  I can't just keep blowing money like this.  Awesome work man!!!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content:
Word up Piotr, let me take a moment here to tell you this: Thanks bro!!!
Totally appreciate the consistency you gat going there :)

title: No more!

comment: Excellent for zenwatch 2!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Daniel, always nice to hear from happy campers!

comment: Works great I customized it And it looks sick

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up quanteldata, thanks for the great comment, much appreciated!

title: Amazing

author: Alex Gentilucci
comment: It's perfect now, thanks!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Alex, glad you got it all set.... Thanks for the comment :)

title: Perfect now!

author: Luis Rodriguez
comment: Battery hog

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Luis... maybe just need need to re-install it... because that watch face consumption level is SUPER low...  email me and i have benchmark test to prove it :)

author: Darryl Wolford
comment: Has it all

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Darryl... thanks for the great comment, good to know!

title: Awesome

author: Russell Richardson
comment: Battery seems to be impacted. Can't even get a whole day anymore, even without Ambient mode enabled. :/ Edit: Seems the battery issues are fixed for me! Thank you!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Russell...Thanks for the comment!  ill keep working at it :)

title: Looks great, and is smooth unlike other faces!

author: Thomas Galland
comment: This is a great watch face with a ton of customizations. The only suggestion I have is to have one extra face added to the type (Square/Circle) modes for the watch which would be the "Flat Tire" look for all Moto watches.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Thomas, thanks for the support and ill make sure to keep improving!

title: Beautiful

author: Miljenko Ugarkovic
comment: App widgets and savable presets, the new version has everything it needs now.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Miljenko... AWESOME!!!!!! Thanks for the feedback's...

title: V. Nice!

author: Chad Zenzen
comment: Great watch face has everything and really cool design! Love that it displays battery level for both watch and phone! Adjusting colors was a little difficult to do and sometimes had do it twice to take effect. Weather worked great which for me is often a problem with other faces. Over all best watch face I have used period!! Nice Job

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Chad, its work in progress and i really appreciate your comments, stick around while this thing evolves :)

title: Awesome Watch Face!!!!!

author: Anthony Torrence
comment: Started out with your NAVI watch (which I still like) and decided to upgrade to this. Once again, the colors are very bright and don't diminish the quality of numbers/text. As for the glow? What a wonderful bonus to make the face stand out even more. ☺  P.S. There's a tiny problem with the digital clock. When I swipe up for a notification card, my clock is moved to the top of the screen as well. When I swipe down from the middle, it goes back to the bottom?

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Anthony, there's a switch in the settings for that. Its call "Transition watch when shown" it will lock the clock in the position its at when you hit that switch. You can email me to talk about it anytime as well, Thanks for the feedback's as usual. (don't forget to email me for help)

comment: I got this watch face because I thought it looked awesome, however it's always stuck in "day mode" so I just have a white watch face with white letters and I can't see anything.  EDIT: after continuing to use this face I decided to change my rating. The settings don't save, as soon as you close Android wear and reopen the app they have all reverted.  Definitely would get a refund if I could

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Ryan, email me ill fix you right up...  Thanks for the feedback.

title: Looks great, settings don't work

author: Julianto Chandra
comment: The design is great and i love it. The ambient also great, not blocky like some other watchfaces. However please fix the phone battery display, mine was stuck at 70%. Picking other watchfaces and repick doesn't work either. Weather info not visible.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Julianto, would you be inclined to email me about it we could try to re-install it together? Thanks for taking the time to leave a review i appreciate.

title: Great design, however a few display option not working

author: Shadi Shalabi
comment: All settings are vague.. Don't know what they mean.. Because they never save.. I don't see any difference. Going back to settings shows no change! If fixed.. I will improve rating. If I could.. I would refund. Some setting work on phone. But ambient is hardly visible on sw3. Energy save vs mono or color no difference.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Shadi... sorry your having troubles, did you try to reinstall? Yes its better to change settings from the phone... Thanks for the feedbacks

title: Looks good but nothing else works..

author: Teun Segers
comment: Day/Night handles color contract badly. Can't have battery gauges and text percentage at same time (like screenshot). It   should work as advertised out of the box. Refunded.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Teun, can you email me about it i would love to help you out and will do my best to make it work perfectly for you, thanks for taking the time to leave a comment.

title: Can't get it to work as advertised

author: vicky lear
comment: I like this one :-) All the readings seem to work and you can customise the colours of everything. The ambient mode is clean and simple and just works.  I would like to be able to choose to see steps or distance instead of battery life but it's a small thing.  I've tried a lot of watchfaces lately and this is definitely one of my favourites

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Vicky, this is a super nice review. Pretty glad to hear it. Thanks for the feedbacks!!!

title: Great

author: Kris
comment: Watch face looks amazing on my Moto 360 and I love that it can be customized.  UPDATE.  Tha Phlash is awesome at customer service, he pushed out an update shortly after I notified him of issues with this watch face and it's been rock solid since.  Thank you!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Kristopher, glad you noticed and thanks for coming back to let me know. Class act.

title: I liked the original version better.

author: Chad Easley
comment: Great watch face, but could you remove the leading zero for single digit hours?  It's inappropriate for 12 hour time. EDIT: Leading zero option added!  Thanks!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Chad, thanks for the feedback i appreciate it!

title: Beautiful, with one flaw

author: Joost Zilla
comment: After installing the latest version the configuration crashed. But after clear instructions from the author of this watchface it works perfectly again. Thanks a lot for your help Tha PHLASH

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Joost, awesome im glad its fixed, hope you enjoy and thanks for taking the time to comment!

title: Even better after latest update

author: Dancingwraith
comment: Bought this for my motorcycle 360. Uninstalled multiple times but the app is no where to be found. It's also not found inside Android wear app.  But apparently it started to showed up after an hour. I have no idea why. But overall its quite a nice watch face

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Dancingwraith, glad you are set! Thanks for the feedback.

author: Tim Kirkpatrick
comment: This is my new favorite watch face.  One thing I'd like to see is the ability to customise the "STATION" at the top.   You're the bomb Tha PHLASH. Keep it up!

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Tim, ill take notes, thanks for the support on my work, im grateful.

author: Dean L
comment: One of the best wear watches out there. Design nails it. Everything you would need in a glance. Only one recommendation, please allow for background color change. I wish i would have full black background.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Dean, ill do my best, thanks for taking the time to leaver a comment its much appreciated.

title: One of the best but...

author: Sergey Irishkov
comment: Seems that it drains battery twice faster than standard Huawei's watchfaces.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Sergey, can you email me about it? we could try a reinstall together. Thanks for taking the time to leave a feedback.

title: Draining the battery.

author: Edwin Steve Lopez
comment: Makes the Moto 360 2nd gen run slow + digi clock position is incorrect and removing it will not work.

reply.author: Tha PHLASH
reply.content: Word up Edwin, if you want to email me ill explain how to lock the digital clock at the desired spot, and give you some help for efficiency... Thanks for taking the time to leave a comment.
